website_summaries.verdict: This kettle looks great and is both cheaper and more powerful than similar models, but keep an eye on it as its auto-shutoff feature is the weak point.
pros: Has a nice look, and a solid build
Blue LED lights up when the water starts to boil
Auto-shutoff when boil is reached or when the water level gets too low
cons: Some buyers report problems after a couple of months with rusting, broken LED lights, and especially the auto-shutoff feature

customer_reviews.title: ... kettle to replace a plastic one that was working fine but looked ugly on my counter top
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Glass Electric kettle because I really like the look of it on my new counter top (the previous one I had was plastic.) It does the job: heats up the water very fast, is easy to fill, easy to pour the hot water out. The lid doesn't come off completely like the previous one but that is not a problem. It has a larger capacity (about 7 cups), which is an advantage because I like to make large pots of tea every morning and i don't have to refill to boil more water. I've been using it several times a day and after 4 months of use I still can't think of any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Fifi Laflamme

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 months and the bottom is already starting to melt. The claims that this will last 10 years is ridiculous. I bought it based off the great reviews but I am quite disappointed. The seller is no help and wanted to send me a used/damaged replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Abby G.

customer_reviews.title: The switch doesn’t work after a couple of months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it because it’s pretty, and supposed to be a simple product without any issues to it, according to the many good reviews. My only issue with it is the only issue I shouldn’t have, and that’s the switch just stopped working a few weeks ago! It pops up every time I press down on it to turn it on. It used to happen every once in a while, but now it happens every time I try to turn it on, and it takes like me 10-20 tries to switch on my kettle to boil water. So disappointed I actually wrote a review!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back to stovetop kettles!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kettle in September and we have been using it multiple times daily ever since. I got tired of rusty metal stovetop kettles and their horrible shrieking noises. This electric kettle heats water FAST and is very quiet to boot. The kids and I both appreciate the cool blue LED "glow," too. This is great for tea, oatmeal, condensed soups ... you name it. Everything still works perfectly from the light to the auto shut-off. No issues whatsoever. Will update this review if anything changes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: negative creep

customer_reviews.title: Boiled fine but cracked
customer_reviews.text: Products boiled water very fast, but I used it 3 times and the 3rd time I lifted the kettle off the base I heard a snap sound and looked at the kettle and it had cracked right behind the handle, The kettle was not even halfway full, I don't know if mine was faulty or maybe had a hairline crack already but really? cracking after 3 uses seems a little strange
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might Start A Fire!
customer_reviews.text: Could be dangerous and possibly start a fire! I've had mine for about a year now and it decided to stop auto shut off. I assume that if you turn it on and go outside for a little while all the water will boil off and then start a fire. Luckily, when I did just this, I came back in the house to find just a little water left in the kettle. I had filled to the half way mark and was out for about fifteen minutes when I returned. This is NOT a good thing. Buyer beware. Two stars only because it was a good item while it was working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: ODDBALL1958

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut off won't work of you forget to pinch the tabs closed on the lid
customer_reviews.text: Heats fast, is pretty, but the lid sucks! You have to pinch the tabs on the lid to close and open. This would have been so much better of the tabs were on the handle (away from steam and more convenient. Having this on the lid is just a little more clumsy. And of you don't pinch them closed before you heat water the automatic shut off won't work because there is a little filter at the spout that needs to be in place for the auto shut off to work. So of you forget to pinch the lid closed, the water will still boil and not shut off automatically. Poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wo

customer_reviews.title: on/off doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use, the kettle heater: (1) won't stay on when I first turn it on (2) won't automatically turn off when the water is boiling. I put a weight on the on/off switch lever (an overturned saucer) after turning it on so it doesn't immediately shut off. The kettle design is attractive, and I can actually keep using it "as is" for awhile. It's not worth trying to return it to amazon. I should have bought a kettle from a local store instead.
customer_reviews.author: XY

customer_reviews.title: Good kettle, difficult lid
customer_reviews.text: Great kettle, reaches temp in a timely fashion. Easy to clean out. The lid is frustrating though. My last kettle (a different brand) had a button that released the lid. This one is a little more frustrating--it has two clamps on the top of the lid, and you have to squeeze them and pull up to get it open. If you've just boiled water, this is tricky because hot water may splatter around. Overall, it's difficult to win with these. Either the kettle is frustrating and has plastic or silicon glue in places that touch the water as it reaches temp, or you get one with a great kettle design but a rubbish lid. No in-between, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E

customer_reviews.title: Will burn your hand when you pour
customer_reviews.text: I like electric kettles, been a fan for years. I like the idea of a small kettle, as I am usually making 1 cuppa, occasionally 2. But the design of this kettle, which heats quickly, causes it to pour steam up the hand which is holding it while you try to pour. You would have to wait for it to cool significantly. Also - it has no temp control and when it boils, it boils for what seems like 2 minutes before shutting off. Who wants overboiled water and a burned hand - not me.
customer_reviews.author: Tama Cathers

customer_reviews.title: Handy kettle!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this kettle for a couple of years now and has worked tremedously and boiling the water to a point you are like hope it doesn't break and it has not...thank God! However am seeing some stains on the bottom am thinking its the water so that is a bummer! But will try cleaning and see. Would definately buy another and hopefully they have made some adjustments to the product with time. And yeah it does shut itself off which is a definate PLUS!
customer_reviews.author: cate

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water out of the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost a year ago, and use it at least once a day to make tea. It started to leak water out of the bottom, when I tilt it to pour the water out. Luckily, it only happens when it’s tilted, so nothing comes out while it’s on the stand. It’s still a huge concern - I’ll have to replace it for fear of getting shocked. It’s a shame, because the unit is really easy to use and clean, but clearly unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use it's starting to get an odd film on bottom, we only use bottled water in it so I'm not sure what it is. We clean nightly so it' not because we aren't clean. You can wipe it away with some elbow grease but comes back after a couple uses. I do like that it heats up pretty fast and has an automatic shut off. Have used each weekday for the last 2 weeks and have no complaints other than the weird film.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, but died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough, but we did find you had position the pot just right on the base to get the lever to stay down. If it was turned so the handle didn't line up well with the conduit, you'd have to press down 5-6 times before it would stay down and heat up. After a little under two years, the pot died, a seal failed, and hot water was released all over the counter top. Would have liked it to have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: That on switch is faulty. Can I return thia?
customer_reviews.text: My kettle is now 18 days old. Despite the glass container and blue rim of lights to indicate on wich are a plus, I do not like it and would not repurchase. There already is a rust spot at the bottom. The most annoying thing is the lever to turn it on, you must push it at least 5 times to operate. It's very annoying and therefore an unhappy experience in what should be a smimple operation.
customer_reviews.author: milne

customer_reviews.title: Something is seriously wrong and likely toxic with this kettle
customer_reviews.text: After I started getting stomach pains each day at different times, I did an elimination diet over several weeks without any success. Accidentally, I skipped drinking hot tea one day and noticed the pains went away. I did that again another day with the same results. I realized that this kettle and no others are used in my home was giving me significant stomach pain from some toxin or chemical leaching into the water. While I see reviews on Amazon that say don't buy a product, I can flatly and rationally say don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: h&m

customer_reviews.title: New baby <3
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle! My boyfriend wants to return it because it doesn't have temperature control settings, but I won't let him! It boils water very quickly, and I love how beautiful it looks at night/early in the morning with the blue led light. I use it every day, all throughout the day for making coffee and tea. I even use it to boil things on the stovetop quicker, like pastas, or if I happen to add too little water to a recipe. It's so much faster than traditional boiling! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: m.horner

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I make lots of coffee and tea throughout the day, so I really need one kettle which heats up quickly. This kettle has sturdy handle, elegant appearance and easy on-off switch. What I like most is that it turns off automatically when the water was boiled. This saves a lot of electricity. After using it, I can clean this kettle easily, and this prevents it from mineral coating. So it's a good choice for those who enjoys coffee and tea a lot.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: DONT BUY THIS STARTED TO BURN UP ON ITS OWN -DO NOT BUY IT ALSO BURNED UP OUR OUTLET DO NOT BUY This is great! I use this to make tea, oatmeal, hot cocoa! Love it! So versatile and it looks super cool with the lights on it!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kettle came this morning. I immediately put it to use. I put water in it, turned it on, the blue lights lit up, and I became an instant cheerleader "Go Kettle!" Like a child, I am happy. This kettle came with an instruction booklet, but like a real man, I didn't read it,LOL! Seriously, Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Auto-shutoff stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot to like about this kettle. Its aesthetic design, the quick heating and cleaning and the ease of filling it with water. However, I was disappointed to find that the thermal auto-shutoff stopped working after only 6 months of usage. The kettle still heats well but now I must make sure I keep a watchful eye on it so I can manually shut it off once it brings the water to a boil.
customer_reviews.author: Sailfish

customer_reviews.title: Hard not to overpraise
customer_reviews.text: This kettle has changed our life. We just returned from 2 weeks in England and all the hotels we stayed at had these electric kettles and we wanted one like it. So speedy in the morning! My husband does pour-over coffee and I do a french press. We have a gas stove and we timed boiling on the burner vs. the electric kettle. This kettle boiled the water in half the time. Our teenage sons can use it to make cocoa and cup-of-noodles when we're not home because it shuts off automatically when the water boils so no worry about hazard. We also use it to sanitize water for the hummingbird feeder. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty kettle. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty kettle. So far so good, works well, and heats water quickly. Unfortunately or fortunately depending on your perspective, i can see the limescale already accumulating in the kettle after a month of use. (That is a function of the hard water in my area, not the kettle). So no real complaints overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ouanza Ahanotu

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time and money. Mine started rusting in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Sara Haghighi

customer_reviews.title: great product but be aware how to close lid fully
customer_reviews.text: like quick boil and automatic shut off when hot dislike had to find out that closing lid completely is essential for auto shut-off to work as bolded stated in the user manual simply pushing down firmly on the lid near the spout closes the lid, but NOT completely so auto shut-off not enabled be aware that one must push down on lid near spout and also near lid-hinge to get total sealing and activation of auto shut-off once lid closure method of fully closed is discovered, auto-shut off enabled, product gets 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have hand strength, don't choose this one
customer_reviews.text: It heats water quickly as claimed. The pretty blue lights that were visible while heating quickly dimmed. After one week the only light of original brightness is just below the handle. The design of the lid would make it very difficult for someone with compromised strength in their hands. It takes two hands to open the lid for filling. Poor design of lid requires pressure on both sides of lid to open. So I like this product for it's speed of heating, but it fails on other features.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: If the lid is not completely snapped closed, the water will just keep boiling. The filter screen at the spout sometimes falls off. The blue light is nice. We use this several times daily now for more than a year. The feel of this in the hand when pouring water out of it is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and its fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I usually only put water to minimum line to make my tea and its ready in probably 2 1/2 min. I usually stop it before it comes to a full rolling boil. Like all the other electric kettles I've seen it does get a little loud. I leave it at my desk so i no longer have to heat up water in the microwave. I use a metal tumbler so i would always have to heat water in a regular cup then put it in my metal cup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Les Hoff

customer_reviews.title: NO COMPLAINTS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kettle because I needed something that was quick to give me hot water for my tea and coffee in the morning. Ive been using this everyday since. It has no issues at all. Its easy to clean, there are no small crevices that I cant get into. The light is an awesome feature that helps at night when I dont want to turn on my kitchen lights. Everything is as described and I would get it again if I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle to own! Reliable and with auto shut off.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for reliability. Water boils and fun to watch too. I love the automatic shut-off and now I can go upstairs, while boiling water and if I happen to forget, I know it will shut off by itself. I'll go back downstairs and my water is boiling hot. The hand on this is smooth, glass is smooth. The bottom warmer is plastic cylinder and it also feels smooth. Nice to show off when I have company and need hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had this unit for over a year now and it’s still my favorite thing in the kitchen. Works flawlessly without any issues We are huge tea drinkers in the family so we use it more than average family would and kettle works great.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Morgun

customer_reviews.title: I finally took the plunge and purchased this electric kettle and I couldn't be happier! It's so fast
customer_reviews.text: After years of using (barely) hot water from a water dispenser at work, the service was discontinued, which left me to microwaving my water for tea or French press coffee. I finally took the plunge and purchased this electric kettle and I couldn't be happier! It's so fast, easy to use, and I ditched the microwave entirely. The kettle is a bit large for my purposes, but I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jklaw

customer_reviews.title: On/Off Lever No Longer Works One Month In
customer_reviews.text: I've had this electric kettle a month and the on/off lever has stopped working. A couple of weeks ago it began to become difficult to turn the lever to On (it presses down but doesn't catch). Last week it stopped turning off on its own when the water boiled. Now the lever doesn't work at all so I can't even turn the kettle on. I'd love for the seller/manufacturer to contact me so we can try to figure something out. I was an electric kettle convert until it stopped working so soon after purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rosman

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok kettle. The blue lights are pretty. I had a problem the first time I used it where it wasn't shutting off. It turned out I hadn't clicked the lid when closing it and even though it looked closed, it was not shutting off. I'm not tempted to return it though. I just watch out for the lid now.
customer_reviews.author: Mihaela

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for hot water...this is your product!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you...if you are looking to get really hot water in less than 2 minutes...this is your product. My wife and myself drink a lot of hot tea and coffee during the day and we bought different teapots but we were not convinced. A friend told us about the electric kettle and after doing the research my wife bought this one and it is the best thing ever!!! If you want hot water to make just one cup of coffee or tea it takes less than 1 minute to get really hot water. I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: LRSV

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After only almost one month, no blue light, do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Qing Ye

customer_reviews.title: Will not shut off if the lid is not completely closed
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and really fast. The lid can be a bit awkward to close and it will not shut off automatically if the lid is not completely closed. You cannot tell from any distance if it's properly closed. You must first close the lid, then squeeze both red buttons together, then push the lid down all the way. Nope - you can't just squeeze the two red levers together and close it. Doing that produces an obstruction which prevents closure. It's a two step procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Orville

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well and pretty light show while it does it
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to favorite for bringing water to a boil for coffee, tea and whatever. This item does only one job but it does that job well. I sent units to my family for Christmas and they all seemed to like it. The LED show makes a mundane task more pleasant and fun.
customer_reviews.author: marvo

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Boils water quickly for tea or soup ! Looks great on my counter. Glass is easy to clean and leaves no after taste like my old plastic one!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a year ago and it quickly became a "can't live without" item. It boils water so damned fast....we use it instead of boiling water on the stove, for everything. I plan to buy another for my elderly Dad who has little patience for boiling water. It's attractive and durable too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H. Kanoza

customer_reviews.title: Blue lighting often stops working
customer_reviews.text: Water boils quickly and effectively. But after couple months of light use, the blue hue under the pitcher stopped working without warning. The blue light only comes on sometimes, and will even goes off while the boiler is still heating the water. This made it difficult to tell if the water is done or not.
customer_reviews.author: S.K

customer_reviews.title: If you boil a lot of water - get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product entirely. This gets used at least 6x a day in my house and it has saved my stovetop and a bunch of time - always had to move things around in order to boil some water or cook a meal. Love the pretty blue lights. Just make sure the cover is snapped down or else it will boil until water has evaporated.
customer_reviews.author: MR PD AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: The workhorse of my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I drink tea like it's my job, so I boil water with my electric kettle 6-8 times a day on average. I've done this for months on-end and this thing still works like a champ. It also looks like a spaceship when it's on. Are the blue lights necessary? No. Are they awesome? Heck yeah. If mine ever bites the dust (which will be a very sad day), I will replace it with another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Nice I bought this for my cousin for Christmas. She loved it. I have another one that I have it takes minutes to heat up. Much better then using the microwave or teapot on stove. It turns of automatically and, pretty blue color when you are trying to boil water. I love mine. I am sure this one is just as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I had such high hopes for this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product hoping that it would be the one. I have been looking for a Hot water Tea kettle, and unfortunately, the 2 I ordered (1 replacement) were both scratched on the outside as well as the inside. I returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This worked very efficiently. My water boiled quickly. I used my kettle 2-3 x a day all through the winter and into the spring. I used it less often over the summer, around 1-2 x a week. Nearly a year later my kettle is leaking and due to the potential for electrical shorts and fire I will have to replace it. While I liked its efficiency and functionality, I think a product should last with regular use for more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anthie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because it was glass and I could see through it and so far it’s amazing I wish I had bought it sooner and stopped second guessing myself it’s fast holds a lot of water really easy to use and absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.author: jiniguez

customer_reviews.title: Had for less than a month already broke
customer_reviews.text: The automatic shutoff is broke after less than a month's use. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again. Works until it does not and you are past the return window...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for amongst two years now. About a year and a half into it, the kettle stopped turning itself off when boiling. Now it boils until you MANUALLY turn it off. It will let all the water boil out. VERY DANGEROUS and disappointing. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CraveForShoes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice electric kettle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice electric kettle. I use it daily without any issues. Heats water very fast - about 5 to 7 minutes and auto shuts off after boiling. It has a good click but it would be nice if it had some sort of alert when it boils, in case you are distracted. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erv Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Leaks: This water kettle can not hold water
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazingly beautiful and functional kettle until less than 60 days after delivery when it started inexplicably leaking from the bottom. I would like to return it for a replacement but I fear that returns are allowed only up to the 30th day.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kettle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Kettle. The wide mouth makes it easy to fill, I boil 1 Liter of water every morning for my coffee press. It's quick, by the time I've ground my beans, readied the press, it's ready to pour. I would certainly recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Karo56

customer_reviews.title: It's a kettle.
customer_reviews.text: Kettle takes a while to get boiled. It's not as good as my old one which boiled rather quickly. As it's clear you can see everything inside, so needs more washing. Unless you can't be bothered. I miss my old kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Deadpool1

customer_reviews.title: Plug doesn't fit in any standard outlets.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit confused.... I unpacked this today and am totally unable to use it. It has a plug like none I've ever seen and will not fit into any outlets. I'm very disappointed and will have to seethed it back. I can't understand why no one else has complained of this issue????
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: worked fine at first but NOW
customer_reviews.text: when i fist got it it worked great.. loved the light ring and the AUTO SHUT OFF .... however after some usage the auto shut off no longer works, the light will go off but it will just boil away everything in it
customer_reviews.author: Tim Carver

customer_reviews.title: Leaked from the bottom onto electric pad it was sitting on
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product. Very first try it started leaking from the bottom between the kettle and the ELECTRIC pad that it was on.
customer_reviews.author: Bender is Great

customer_reviews.title: And on/off switch is flimsy and not in a good location!
customer_reviews.text: Does not automatically turn off. And on/off switch is flimsy and not in a good location!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: because I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned an electric kettle before now, and I have no idea why, because I love this thing. It boils water in a matter of minutes. I mean, two to three actual minutes and this thing is at a rapid boil. It's fantastic and I would definitely recommend. The quality is good, sturdy, and the safety features are great.
customer_reviews.author: kaylynjay

customer_reviews.title: Works great as I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use it for making tea, which I drink every day. Heats water very fast. Easily my most used small appliance and I have no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Combes

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: We like this electric kettle very much. I didn't find it difficult to clean with the built in filter on top. Four stars instead of five because, the toggle switch at the bottom of the unit looks like it could easily be broken off if one is not careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Was working great for 1 year but the auto switch just failed and kettle was damaged
customer_reviews.text: So take it for what it's worth, I definitely should have been watching it. But the kettle has worked great for about a year which I use on avg about 2x week. But the auto switch didn't turn off until all the water was melted and damaged the base of the pot. I'm glad it didn't start a fire. So maybe that's a good thing and I should have watched it, but would rather have it work as designed. thanks and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Ching

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but it came with the top broken in a way that keeps it from latching. Not sure if a shipping or manufacturing issue. No damage on the box to indicate mishandling during shipping. Still works great so didn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great working kettle, lives up to its name.
customer_reviews.text: The kettle works great. There is no need to use the stove. I love how the water boils and shuts off automatically. It's the best kettle I've bought through the years, and I've had many, and none works like this one. I only have one concern, when the water boils and shuts off, I notice a small amount of water coming from the base of it when i pour the water, I don't know if that's normal. Other than that, I have no complaints, it really works just like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite kitchen item I’ve bought recently. The water warms up so so fast! I bought this for my hubby who is always drinking tea. He uses it several times a day. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Jane

customer_reviews.title: It's good. Simple and good.
customer_reviews.text: It boils water and it looks pretty. What more could you want from it? Oh it doesn't have a specific temperature setting. It's either on our off. Though you can turn it off whenever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle, it heats up super fast and is easy to keep clean. I have been using it for about a year now at least once a day and it still looks brand new. Great for a college kid who lives off of ramen and tea. Happy to have found a kettle that wasn't plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this heated, very quickly and frees up stove space. I used it to make my AM coffee. product_meta.description:
This Aicok glass kettle does an excellent job at boiling the water in just a couple of minutes.

1.7 MAX CAPACITY FOR:

2. Leave the pot overnight and rinse it in the morning.
3. Remove any discoloration that remains with a paper towel. 

Product Specifications:
Operating Power: 1500 Watts
Cord Length: 27 inches

Package:

NOTE:
1. Do not leave still water in the kettle without drying.
2. Try to immersed the base in vinegar or clean it by lemon juice if it turned to a nasty color.
3. Keep away from the electric kettle when boiling water. Due to glass material, kettle body will hot. You could grip the cool handle to pour water.
